name: SliverVisibility
desc: Whether to show or hide a sliver child.

fields.name: sliver
fields.desc: The sliver to show or hide, as controlled by [visible].

fields.name: replacementSliver
fields.desc: The widget to use when the sliver child is not [visible], assuming that none of the `maintain` flags (in particular, [maintainState]) are set.

fields.name: visible
fields.desc: Switches between showing the [sliver] or hiding it.

fields.name: maintainState
fields.desc: Whether to maintain the [State] objects of the [sliver] subtree when it is not [visible].

fields.name: maintainAnimation
fields.desc: Whether to maintain animations within the [sliver] subtree when it is not [visible].

fields.name: maintainSize
fields.desc: Whether to maintain space for where the sliver would have been.

fields.name: maintainSemantics
fields.desc: Whether to maintain the semantics for the sliver when it is hidden (e.g. for accessibility).

fields.name: maintainInteractivity
fields.desc: Whether to allow the sliver to be interactive when hidden.
